mapper.select: select id, roadSectionId, latitude, longitude, createUserId, createUserName, DATE_FORMAT(createDate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") createDate, DATE_FORMAT(gatherTime,"%Y-%m-%d %T") gatherTime from road_gps where roadSectionId=#{p.id} order by gatherTime

select m.* from ( SELECT DISTINCT rm.id as roadManId, rm.`name` AS manName, r.`name` AS roadName, rs.`name` AS sectionName, rs.startName, rs.endName, t.roadSectionId, t.latitude, t.longitude, round( 6378.138*2*asin(sqrt( pow(sin((#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*pi()/180 - t.latitude * pi()/180)/2),2) + cos(#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*pi()/180)*cos(t.latitude*pi()/180)* pow(sin((#{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}*pi()/180 - t.longitude*pi()/180)/2),2) ))*1000 ) as distance FROM `road_gps` t LEFT JOIN road_section rs ON t.roadSectionId = rs.id LEFT JOIN road_man rm ON rs.roadMan = rm.id LEFT JOIN road r ON rs.roadId = r.id )m, portal.config c where c.config_key= 'radius' and c.syid='taa' and m.distance <= c.config_value order by distance limit 0,2
